programme.title: Alone Australia - Day 8: 6 People Remain Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - As hunger, fatigue and cold take their toll, the remaining participants are forced to question why they're enduring the toughest challenge of their lives. For one, the reasons to stay are outweighed by the reasons to leave.

programme.title: Miriam Margolyes: Australia Unmasked Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Starting in Tasmania, Miriam Margolyes is confronted with the complexities of Tasmania's rich history. She navigates these confronting themes all while meeting those still fighting for a 'fair go'.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep254
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Yellingbo Artists' House Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Peter Maddison meets Laurie Smith and Renee Hoareau, who plan to build a cube-shaped home of steel, stone and glass where they can create and display their artworks at Yellingbo, Victoria.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep254
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep200
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep254
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - More news, more often: the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's team of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Andrea Nierhoff.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - One woman's decades-long quest for justice. Beth Heinrich was permanently changed by what she experienced as a teenager. Now in her 80s, she's spent almost half her lifetime chasing the Anglican Church to right past wrongs.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep254
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and complete coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Andrea Nierhoff.

programme.title: Built To Survive Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Phil Breslin visits the savannah for an encounter with Australia's largest predatory bird, a wedge-tailed Eagle, one of the world's most venomous snakes - the coastal taipan and a real-life dragon - the frill-necked lizard.

programme.title: The World Ep254
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and the day's major events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep36
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Costa and Tammy explore the plants and gardens of Indonesia, one of Australia's nearest neighbours. This incredible island nation is one of the most biodiverse places on earth, filled with unique species found nowhere else.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep200
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Laura Tingle presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep254
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Decoding Danger Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Australia is shaped by great storms, extreme heat, and an epic cycle of boom and bust. Life on the island continent has evolved accordingly, to survive drought and flooding rains. How can we learn to survive and thrive?

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Peter Maddison meets Laurie Smith and Renee Hoareau, who plan to build a cube-shaped home of steel, stone and glass where they can create and display their artworks at Yellingbo, Victoria.

programme.title: The World Ep254
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and the day's major events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep200
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Laura Tingle presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. (Final for 2023)

programme.title: Australian Story Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - One woman's decades-long quest for justice. Beth Heinrich was permanently changed by what she experienced as a teenager. Now in her 80s, she's spent almost half her lifetime chasing the Anglican Church to right past wrongs.

programme.title: Catalyst Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 20 - Journalist Ruby Jones meets some of the 2.5 million Australians whom body image concerns have become a serious mental health issue. Ruby discovers that far from vanity these disorders are crippling people's lives. (Final)

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep255
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Emma Rebellato and Catherine Murphy bring you news and interviews, Rani Hayman with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep255
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - When big stories break, turn to Gemma Veness in the morning to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep255
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The leading news at lunchtime. Melissa Mackay brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Catalyst Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 21 - Catalyst sets up a pop-up dental clinic in Western Sydney to investigate Australia's most common dental complaints, uncovering the tips to keep your mouth healthy and revealing surprising secrets behind a beautiful smile.

programme.title: The Dark Emu Story
programme.desc: A thought-provoking and inspiring documentary that charts the impact of Bruce Pascoe's Dark Emu - the publishing phenomenon that challenged Australia to rethink its history and ignited a debate that continues to rage.

programme.title: Compass Ep22
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Brendan Watkins is the son of a priest and nun. It took him 30 years to find out, but he's not the only one. Brendan meets other hidden children and their mothers, who've suffered from the Church's silence and denial.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep12

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Greg and Trish's house on Hobart's Battery Point waterfront is in the perfect spot, so they didn't want to go far. They bought an old cottage next door and integrated them into one house with two distinct personalities.

programme.title: Fancy Fruit Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Have you eaten a persimmon? If you haven't, you're not alone. And it's a sometimes-misunderstood fruit. Where better to go to learn that a Queensland orchard celebrating a record crop.

programme.desc: Lurking under the sea is a global web of fibre optic telecommunication cables, the plumbing of the internet. It's how we talk, text and stream, connecting billions of people. These cables are also the frontline of a tech war.

programme.title: The Homes That Built Australia Ep3

programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.
